content.$t:
status: assess, category: language & framework, tags: javascript, description: React (sometimes styled React.js or ReactJS) is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
It is maintained by Facebook, Instagram and a community of individual developers and corporations. According to JavaScript analytics service Libscore, React is currently being used on the websites of Netflix, Imgur, Bleacher Report, Feedly, Airbnb, SeatGeek, HelloSign, Walmart, and others., url: https://facebook.github.io/react/

gsx$description.$t:
React (sometimes styled React.js or ReactJS) is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
It is maintained by Facebook, Instagram and a community of individual developers and corporations. According to JavaScript analytics service Libscore, React is currently being used on the websites of Netflix, Imgur, Bleacher Report, Feedly, Airbnb, SeatGeek, HelloSign, Walmart, and others.

content.$t: status: assess, category: tools, tags: javascript, description: Gulp is a toolkit for automating painful or time-consuming tasks in your development workflow, so you can stop messing around and build something., url: http://gulpjs.com/

gsx$description.$t: Gulp is a toolkit for automating painful or time-consuming tasks in your development workflow, so you can stop messing around and build something.

content.$t: status: adopt, category: tools, description: In one word: automation. The less work you have to do when performing repetitive tasks like minification, compilation, unit testing, linting, etc, the easier your job becomes., url: http://gruntjs.com/

gsx$description.$t: In one word: automation. The less work you have to do when performing repetitive tasks like minification, compilation, unit testing, linting, etc, the easier your job becomes.

content.$t: status: adopt, category: tools, description: Bower can manage components that contain HTML, CSS, JavaScript, fonts or even image files. Bower installs the right versions of the packages you need and their dependencies., url: https://bower.io/

gsx$description.$t: Bower can manage components that contain HTML, CSS, JavaScript, fonts or even image files. Bower installs the right versions of the packages you need and their dependencies.

content.$t: status: adopt, category: technique, tags: javascript, description: In JavaScript, the Module pattern is used to further emulate the concept of classes in such a way that we're able to include both public/private methods and variables inside a single object, thus shielding particular parts from the global scope., url: https://addyosmani.com/resources/essentialjsdesignpatterns/book/#modulepatternjavascript

gsx$description.$t: In JavaScript, the Module pattern is used to further emulate the concept of classes in such a way that we're able to include both public/private methods and variables inside a single object, thus shielding particular parts from the global scope.

content.$t: status: assess, category: template engine, tags: javascript, template, description: EJS is a client-side templating language that was originally part of JavaScriptMVC, which has now been replaced by DoneJS. EJS combines data and a template to produce HTML. , url: http://www.embeddedjs.com/

gsx$description.$t: EJS is a client-side templating language that was originally part of JavaScriptMVC, which has now been replaced by DoneJS. EJS combines data and a template to produce HTML.

content.$t: status: assess, category: template engine, description: Mustache is a logic-less template syntax. It can be used for HTML, config files, source code - anything. It works by expanding tags in a template using values provided in a hash or object., url: https://mustache.github.io/

gsx$description.$t: Mustache is a logic-less template syntax. It can be used for HTML, config files, source code - anything. It works by expanding tags in a template using values provided in a hash or object.

content.$t: status: adopt, category: language & framework, tags: javascript, jquery, carousel, description: Fully responsive carousel. Scales with its container. Separate settings per breakpoint. Uses CSS3 when available. Fully functional when not. Swipe enabled. Or disabled, if you prefer. Desktop mouse dragging. Infinite looping. Fully accessible with arrow key navigation. Add, remove, filter & unfilter slides. Autoplay, dots, arrows, callbacks, etc..., url: http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/

gsx$description.$t: Fully responsive carousel. Scales with its container. Separate settings per breakpoint. Uses CSS3 when available. Fully functional when not. Swipe enabled. Or disabled, if you prefer. Desktop mouse dragging. Infinite looping. Fully accessible with arrow key navigation. Add, remove, filter & unfilter slides. Autoplay, dots, arrows, callbacks, etc...

content.$t: status: adopt, category: language & framework, tags: javascript, jquery, description: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers. With a combination of versatility and extensibility, jQuery has changed the way that millions of people write JavaScript., url: https://jquery.com/

gsx$description.$t: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers. With a combination of versatility and extensibility, jQuery has changed the way that millions of people write JavaScript.
